scripts.serve: concurrently "cd backend && npm run serve" "cd frontend && npm run serve "
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && npm run build" "cd frontend && npm run build "

scriptsComments.serve: allows you to start your frontend and backend at the same time in development mode
scriptsComments.build: allows you to start your frontend and backend at the same time in production mode

devDependenciesComments.concurrently: allows you to start both your frontend and backend at the same time.
